languages.text: "Знаки Архиврага — не просто намалеванные символы, а проводники его воли. Слова их молитв, даже сказанные без веры, их гербы, даже носимые обманно — все это увеличивает присутствие Губительных сил рядом с вами и обращает на вас их тлетворное внимание".

"The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."
languages.original_text: "Знаки Архиврага — не просто намалеванные символы, а проводники его воли. Слова их молитв, даже сказанные без веры, их гербы, даже носимые обманно — все это увеличивает присутствие Губительных сил рядом с вами и обращает на вас их тлетворное внимание".

traits.locale_text: "The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention."

"The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."

languages.text: "Die Zeichen des Erzfeinds sind nicht einfach nur gemalte Symbole, sondern Träger seines Willens. Die Worte ihrer Gebete, selbst wenn sie ohne zu glauben gesprochen werden ... ihre Wappen, selbst wenn sie nur zur Tarnung getragen werden ... all das erhöht die Anwesenheit der Mächte der Zerstörung in Eurer Nähe und zieht ihre korrumpierende Aufmerksamkeit auf Euch."
languages.original_text: "The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Zeichen des Erzfeinds sind nicht einfach nur gemalte Symbole, sondern Träger seines Willens. Die Worte ihrer Gebete, selbst wenn sie ohne zu glauben gesprochen werden ... ihre Wappen, selbst wenn sie nur zur Tarnung getragen werden ... all das erhöht die Anwesenheit der Mächte der Zerstörung in Eurer Nähe und zieht ihre korrumpierende Aufmerksamkeit auf Euch."

languages.text: « Ces symboles du Grand Ennemi ne sont pas que de simples peintures, ils sont les conducteurs de sa volonté. Les paroles de leurs prières, même récitées sans foi, leurs blasons, même portés pour les duper... tout cela ne fait qu'accroître la présence des Puissances de la Ruine à vos côtés et attire leur attention corrompue sur vous. »
languages.original_text: "The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."

traits.locale_text: « Ces symboles du Grand Ennemi ne sont pas que de simples peintures, ils sont les conducteurs de sa volonté. Les paroles de leurs prières, même récitées sans foi, leurs blasons, même portés pour les duper... tout cela ne fait qu'accroître la présence des Puissances de la Ruine à vos côtés et attire leur attention corrompue sur vous. »

languages.text: “混沌大敌的标志不仅仅只是画上去的符号，也同样是意志的载体。哪怕只是随随便便地念出祷词，掩人耳目地带上那些徽记，都会让毁灭之力在你身边聚集，吸引它们充满腐化的目光。”
languages.original_text: "The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."

traits.locale_text: “混沌大敌的标志不仅仅只是画上去的符号，也同样是意志的载体。哪怕只是随随便便地念出祷词，掩人耳目地带上那些徽记，都会让毁灭之力在你身边聚集，吸引它们充满腐化的目光。”

languages.text: 「渾沌の勢力の印は、ただシンボルを描くだけではありません。その意志を伝導することです。奴らの祈りの言葉を信仰を持たずに語るだけで、紋章でさえ、偽って着用するだけで、その全てが禍つ神々の存在を身近に感じさせ、腐敗した関心がべたりと張り付くのです」
languages.original_text: "The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力の印は、シンボルを描くだけじゃなく、その意志を伝導する者がいることだ。奴らの祈りの言葉は、信仰を抜きに語られて、紋章でさえ、偽って着用するのに — その全てが〈禍つ神々〉の存在感を近くに感じさせて、腐敗した関心が君にピッタリと張り付くのさ」

languages.text: «Los signos del Archienemigo no son simples símbolos pintados, sino conductores de su voluntad. Las palabras de sus oraciones, incluso pronunciadas sin fe, y sus escudos de armas, incluso llevados con engaño... Todo esto aumenta la presencia de los Poderes Ruinosos en las inmediaciones y atrae su corrupta atención».
languages.original_text: "The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."

traits.locale_text: "Los signos del Archienemigo no son simples símbolos pintados, sino conductores de su voluntad. Las palabras de sus oraciones, incluso pronunciadas sin fe, y sus escudos de armas, incluso llevados con engaño... Todo esto aumenta la presencia de los Poderes Ruinosos en las inmediaciones y atrae su corrupta atención».

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın işaretleri, yalnızca boyanmış sembollerden ibaret değildir. Aynı zamanda iradesinin de kılavuzudur. İnanılmadan edilmiş olsa da dualarının sözleri, dalavere amacıyla giyilmiş olsa da armaları... Bunlar, Yıkıcı Güçler'i etrafında toplar ve yozlaştıran dikkatlerini üzerine çeker."
languages.original_text: "The signs of the Archenemy are not just painted symbols, but conductors of its will. The words of their prayers, even spoken without faith, their coats of arms, even deceitfully worn — all this increases the presence of the Ruinous Powers near you and draws their corrupting attention to you."

traits.locale_text: "Şerbaşı'nın işaretleri, yalnızca boyanmış sembollerden ibaret değildir. Aynı zamanda iradesinin de kılavuzudur. İnanılmadan edilmiş olsa da dualarının sözleri, dalavere amacıyla giyilmiş olsa da armaları... Bunlar, etrafını saran Yıkıcı Güçler'in varlığını kuvvetlendirir ve yozlaştıran dikkatlerini üzerinde toplar."
